alert.note: Alert for Chambers (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chambers County through 300 PM CDT... At 223 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Standing Rock, or near Stroud, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lanett, Stroud, La Fayette, Lakeview, Five Points, Chambers County Lake, Fredonia, Post Oak Forks, Veasey Creek Park, Denson, Huguley, Amity Park, Standing Rock, Welch, Buffalo, Southern Harbor, White Plains, I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett, Rocky Point and Stroud Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
